entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
